cab.content: this document IS the property of HIS BRITANNIC ' Majestyfs government.2682- Electricity.Amendrnent of the Bloctrlcity i (Supply] Act 11919. Memorandum for the Cabinet by the Minister of Transport.In my memorandum of the 10th November, 1920, I submitted a Bill to add to and amend the Electricity (Supply)Act, 1919 in reference to certain matters in which that Acthad been found deficient.I Introduced the Bill at a late period in the Session in Order that those interested in the matter might be made aware of the Government proposals.II is becoming urgently necessary that the amendments in the law proposed by that Rill should be made and i esk leave to re-introduce it in the form in which it has already been approved by the Cabinet.(SIGNED) ERIC GEDDES.7th March, 1921.
